messages.subject: Joyce's internet ballet
messages.msgSnippet: Joyce, I love to watch your reference-presentations unfold.  For me it would be a lot of work to do what you do (seemingly) with ease.  And it might be a whole
messages.messageBody:
Joyce, I love to watch your reference-presentations unfold. For me it would
be a lot of work to do what you do (seemingly) with ease. And it might be a
whole lot of work for you too. So whether it is easy or painstaking, I
wanted to say it's impressive to see the final recital and you're a wonderful
person to have in our midst, for your ability and generosity and walking us
to and through some information that's not just one click away.

Sandra

"Everything counts."
http://expage.com/SandraDodd
http://expage.com/RadicalUnschooling
